GroupBinaryCounters (FB)

Â¶
FUNCTION_BLOCK FINAL GroupBinaryCounters EXTENDS GroupBinaryCountersBase
Group of datapoints of type Binary Counter.
InOut:
Scope
Name
Type
Initial
Comment
Inherited from
Input
tScanPeriod
TIME
TIME#0ms
Scan period for datapoints within group.
If tScanPeriod is set to T#0MS, the OutstationDataModel.tScanPeriod is used.
Can be configured per datapoint as well.

rows.Name: tScanPeriod
rows.Comment:
Scan period for datapoints within group.
If tScanPeriod is set to T#0MS, the OutstationDataModel.tScanPeriod is used.
Can be configured per datapoint as well.
